summary: REQ-8 is only partially implemented: PhotosSection.tsx now references the new image URL and provides English alt text, but the actual static asset file was not added under the uploads path. Additionally, unrelated metadata files were modified that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the newly uploaded image file (Photo_1770974399544.png) to the frontend as a static asset under the existing uploads path so it is reachable via /assets/uploads/Photo_1770974399544.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no new files added ("Added: 0"), so the image file itself was not added to the repository/static assets even though it is referenced in PhotosSection.tsx.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to add an uploaded image asset and display it in the Photos section; it did not request updating documentation/summary files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state tracking / feature request status metadata.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request changes to project tracking metadata files.
